description: Scalene: a high-precision CPU and memory profiler, version 1.5.51 (2025.01.27)
usage: scalene [options] your_program.py [--- --your_program_args] OR python3 -m scalene [options] your_program.py [--- --your_program_args]

arguments.name: your_program_args
arguments.description: Arguments to pass to your_program.py, separated by ---

options.name: --help
options.description: show this help message and exit

options.name: --version
options.description: prints the version number for this release of Scalene and exits

options.name: --column-width
options.description: Column width for profile output (default: 132)

options.name: --outfile
options.description: file to hold profiler output (default: stdout)

options.name: --html
options.description: output as HTML (default: web)

options.name: --json
options.description: output as JSON (default: web)

options.name: --cli
options.description: forces use of the command-line

options.name: --stacks
options.description: collect stack traces

options.name: --web
options.description: opens a web tab to view the profile (saved as 'profile.html')

options.name: --no-browser
options.description: does not open a web tab; just saves the profile ('profile.html')

options.name: --viewer
options.description: opens the Scalene web UI.

options.name: --reduced-profile
options.description: generate a reduced profile, with non-zero lines only (default: False)

options.name: --profile-interval
options.description: output profiles every so many seconds (default: inf)

options.name: --cpu
options.description: profile CPU time (default: True)

options.name: --cpu-only
options.description: profile CPU time (deprecated: use --cpu)

options.name: --gpu
options.description: profile GPU time and memory (default: True)

options.name: --memory
options.description: profile memory (default: True)

options.name: --profile-all
options.description: profile all executed code, not just the target program (default: only the target program)

options.name: --profile-only
options.description: profile only code in filenames that contain the given strings, separated by commas (default: no restrictions)

options.name: --profile-exclude
options.description: do not profile code in filenames that contain the given strings, separated by commas (default: no restrictions)

options.name: --use-virtual-time
options.description: measure only CPU time, not time spent in I/O or blocking (default: False)

options.name: --cpu-percent-threshold
options.description: only report profiles with at least this percent of CPU time (default: 1%)

options.name: --cpu-sampling-rate
options.description: CPU sampling rate (default: every 0.01s)

options.name: --allocation-sampling-window
options.description: Allocation sampling window size, in bytes (default: 10485767 bytes)

options.name: --malloc-threshold
options.description: only report profiles with at least this many allocations (default: 100)

options.name: --program-path
options.description: The directory containing the code to profile (default: the path to the profiled program)

options.name: --memory-leak-detector
options.description: EXPERIMENTAL: report likely memory leaks (default: True)

options.name: --on
options.description: start with profiling on (default)
